content: 76 . - Help yourself. - How delicious! . - What do you do at the Spring Festival? - We make dumplings. . - Which season do you like? - I like fall. It’s cool. . - Does he like winter? - Yes, he does. . - Let’s go to the park. - That’s a good idea. . - What’s the matter? - I have a fever. . That’s too bad. Take care. . I want to ride that. . I’m scared. . - Do you want to come, too? - Sure, let’s go. . - Where are you going? - To the store. . - What about a new watch? - Watches cost too much. . - What’s happening? - Surprise! Happy birthday! . - This is from your aunt. - It’s a cap. But I like robots. . Don’t say that. . - Excuse me. Where’s the post office? - It’s over there. . - May I help you? - I want to send this to Beijing. . - How long does it take? - It takes about 3 days. . - Can you help me? - Sure, I can. . - How many lights are there? - About one hundred. In the Bathroom We’re Taking Photos 话题功能语言表达传统节日季节身体状况娱乐活动购物生日聚会问路家庭生活室内活动 . 餐桌用语 . 谈论中国传统节日及饮食文化 . 问答喜欢的季节与天气 . 问答他人对季节的喜好 . 提出建议和表示赞同 . 问答身体状况 . 表达对他人的关心 . 表达想做的事情 . 表达感觉 . 提出建议及应答 . 问答目的地 . 征求他人的意见 . 庆祝生日及赠送礼物 . 表达对所收礼物的喜好 . 提醒注意 . 问路 . 邮局里的对话 . 问答所需时间 . 问答所处的位置 . 表达正在做的事情 . 寻求帮助 . 数数（60～100） 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 题目单元 . - Where are you? - I’m in the living room. . - What is he doing? - He’s working in his room.
